articles.author: Andy Gregory
articles.title: Archie Battersbee: Family apply to European Court in battle to move boy to hospice - The Independent
articles.description: Family said to be ‘devastated’ after European court refuses to intervene in Archie’s case
articles.content:
Archie Battersbees life-sustaining treatment is to be withdrawn in hospital on Saturday, his family have been told, as their legal battle to have their young son moved to a hospice came to an end.

articles.author: BeSoccer
articles.title: 'No club in Europe wants CR7, Ten Hag doesn't want him...' - BeSoccer EN
articles.description: Jamie Carragher sat down with Gary Neville on 'The Overlap' recently. The Liverpool legend went in on Cristiano Ronaldo. He labelled his move back to United as 'bizarre' and pointed to the fact that no club wants him currently and potentially his teammates do…
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo is top of mind currently. The Portuguese is trying to force a move away from Old Trafford this summer and he is wearing Manchester United's patience thin.
